conversation_history.question: "Can you walk me through a typical day in your role as a salesperson, particularly any challenges you face when trying to close a sale?"
"Tell me about a time when you lost a sale you thought was a sure thing. What happened and how did you handle it?"
"Tell me about the most successful sale you've ever made. What were the factors that contributed to its success?"
